name: 100 Doors: World of puzzles
description:
100 Doors: World of puzzles

Addictive puzzle game 100 Doors: The world of puzzles is a puzzle game in the style of 100 doors, 100 floors or escape from rooms. If you like puzzles - then be sure - you have found what you need. The game has 100 unique levels - puzzles. The main goal in the game is to open the door, for this you need to use improvised objects, various hidden objects, and most importantly - your brain!

How to play
There are various hidden objects scattered on the game scene, using which you need to open the door. In some levels, you will need to solve a non-standard puzzle. In some rooms to apply their ingenuity, dexterity and ingenuity.

Who is this game for?
This game has absorbed all the best moments from such a genre of games as escape from the room, 100 doors, 100 floors, hidden objects. This means that the audience of the game is also very wide, because in this type of games both schoolchildren, students and well-established personalities of both female and male like to play.

Game features
100 doors - 100 interesting levels (we will add new levels during the development process, and also take into account your wishes for the levels)
Beautiful and juicy HD graphics
Gorgeous sound
Interesting logical tasks
Unique puzzles
Convenient management
Game - FREE
Level Skip - FREE
